double_click_menu.friendly_name: Show context menu on a double click
double_click_menu.description: Use a double click anywhere in the page to show its context menu. Requires a restart of Vivaldi to take effect.

css_mods.description: Allow user interface CSS modifications set in Appearance settings.

chrome_pages.description: Do not redirect chrome pages to vivaldi pages

location_override.description: Spoof and protect your geolocation with Location Override.

tabs_button.description: Make the Tabs Button available to use.

speeddial_widgets.friendly_name: Enable Widgets on Speed Dial Groups
speeddial_widgets.description: Allow dashboard widgets to be added on speed dial groups.
